DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability immunogenicity 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate ( 13vPnC ) vaccine manufacture Polysorbate 80 compare 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate ( 13vPnC ) manufacture without Polysorbate 80 give concomitantly routine paediatric vaccination .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine Infants
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Aged 2 month ( 42 98 day ) time enrollment . 2 . Available entire study period whose parent ( ) /legal guardian ( ) could reach telephone . 3 . In good health determine medical history , physical examination , judgment investigator . 4 . Parent ( ) /legal guardian ( ) able complete relevant study procedure study participation . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Previous vaccination license investigational pneumococcal vaccine . 2 . Previous vaccination Hib conjugate , diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis , polio vaccine . 3 . A previous anaphylactic reaction vaccine vaccinerelated component . 4 . Contraindication vaccination Hib conjugate , diphtheria , tetanus , pertussis , polio , hepatitis B , pneumococcal vaccine . 5 . Bleeding diathesis condition associate prolonged bleeding time would contraindicate intramuscular injection . 6 . Known suspected immune deficiency suppression . 7 . History cultureproven invasive disease cause S pneumoniae . 8 . Major know congenital malformation serious chronic disorder . 9 . Significant neurological disorder history seizure ( include febrile seizure ) , significant stable evolve disorder ( cerebral palsy , encephalopathy , hydrocephalus ) , significant disorder . This include resolve syndrome birth trauma Erb palsy . 10 . Receipt blood product Î³globulin ( include hepatitis B immunoglobulin monoclonal antibody [ eg , Synagis ] ) .
